title: League triggering my anti-virus
body:
Long story short, league has been triggering my anti-virus the last few days through its executables through updating, downloading, and actually connecting to a match.

Currently using Webroot Secure Anywhere.

replies.body: I wouldn't recommend disabling your antivirus, but we may be able to help allow access.   Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help individually.  Our tech team will get back to you!
